title: Bad Credit Ok, No long term lease required, Large loft apartments
posting_body: ['MLK Apartments in Las Vegas', 'Low Weekly & Monthly Rates', 'FREE Utilities', 'Free Premium Cable TV', 'Call Now:', 'show contact info', 'Additional Information:', '<URL>', 'Apartment Home Features', '-Unfurnished apartments', '-Easy freeway access', '-Laundry facilities', '-High-speed wireless internet available', '-No long term lease required', '-Sparkling swimming pool', '-Fully furnished apartments', '-Large one bedroom apartments', '-Basketball Court', '-Storage Units', '-Close to shopping', '-Bad Credit Ok', 'Free Siegel Reward Program', 'Earn points every time you pay your rent or refer a friend.', 'Use your points to treat yourself to', 'free rent, food, movies, gift cards', ', and much more!', 'Pet Policy', '20lb weight limit and aggressive breeds such as Pit Bulls and Rottweilers are prohibited.', 'Managed by The Siegel Group', 'Equal Housing Opportunity', 'Pricing may include current special and is subject to change without notice.']
